rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Hey, it's you. Are you
joining the self-defense
corps? ...Haha, just kidding.

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear that Bahn, the Chairman
of the Avaritia Trading
Company, was arrested.

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Thanks to that, the Nopon in the
shops are in an uproar. It seems
some Nopon looked up to Bahn.

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0003
rows.name:
The self-defense corps is on high alert to
make sure the Nopon don't get desperate and
start raising prices or ripping people off.

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0004
rows.name:
It's tough, but we'll do our
best. All we can do now is pray
that no more problems arise.
